DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pasteurized ; Pasteurized Homogenized UHT Treated Homogenized Cow 's Milk Gastrointestinal Symptoms Sensitive Adults
DOC.criteria: Homogenized pasteurized milk cause gastrointestinal problem ( selfreported ) unhomogenized unpasteurized milk cause gastrointestinal problem ( selfreported ) age 1865 BMI 18,5 30 hemoglobin normal range fast plasma alanine aminotransferase ALAT < 60 U/l ( normal liver function ) fast plasma thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) 0.4 4.5 mU/l ( normal thyroid function ) fast plasma creatinine < 118 umol/l ( normal kidney function ) pace maker Crohn 's disease disease intestinal tract intestinal operation within last 3 month difficult dysphagia smoke constipation lactose intolerance coeliac disease
